entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
